headline: Truist to speak at the BofA Securities Financial Services Conference
summary: Truist Financial Corporation (NYSE: TFC) today announced that Chief Wholesale Banking Officer Kristin Lesher will speak at the BofA Securities Financial Services Conference on Wednesday, Feb. 12, 2025, at 11:20 a.m. ET.
